awd_titl_txt: NSF/DARPA Workshop on Machine Learning and Vision
awd_abstract_narration: This award funds a research planning workshop on machine                      learning and computer vision, to be held in Harper's Ferry, West                Virginia, on October 15-17, 1992.  Research in some laboratories                is beginning to make progress toward introduction of learning                   capabilities into computer vision systems.  There is a growing                  interest in interaction between the learning and computer vision                research communities.  This workshop will provide a forum for                   leading researchers from both fields to come together to identify               concepts and approaches in machine learning that have promise for               application to vision, and to develop a research agenda to                      advance the use of learning in computer vision systems.  A report               summarizing the current state of the art and outlining research                 opportunities and priorities will be produced and widely                        distributed.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
